imdb.title: Argonavis from Bang Dream! Animation
imdb.plot: Ren Nanahoshi is a lonely college student who isn't good at communicating with others. He remembers the thrill of watching a live band perform when he was young, and spent most of his days searching for his own identity. One day, ...

episodes.title: Hikari Aru Tokoro e
episodes.plot: Unable to forget the thrill of watching a live band performance he saw when he was young, Ren Nanahoshi spent his days searching for his own identity.

episodes.title: Tensai to Nekkyou
episodes.plot: Yuto finds somebody playing the piano at night at the university. Attracted by the overwhelming performance, Yuto wants him to join the band as the keyboardist.

episodes.title: Bokutachi no Shukkou
episodes.plot: Ren and the others are looking for a drummer as their last band member. A young man named Banri Shiroishi presents himself, but they refuse him because he says he only wants to join the band to make money.

episodes.title: Yume to Genjitsu no Aida ni
episodes.plot: Ren and the others are finally set out to sail as "Argonavis". A new song is nearing its completion, the future is looking bright. Yuto suggests having their debut at a live house. The members, riding the wave, look forward to the day of the event and devote themselves to practicing.

episodes.title: Kako kara no Ketsubetsu
episodes.plot: Argonavis is asked to be the opening act for the band GYROAXIA. However, Yuto and the rest have differing opinions about it. Yuto firmly rejects the opening act appearance because of a past he doesn't want to talk about.

episodes.title: Ryuuseiu
episodes.plot: Yuto messages the rest of Argonavis that he quits the band.

episodes.title: Goal Line
episodes.plot: Argonavis arrives at the Destiny Rock Festival with an intention to experience it from an audience member's point of view. They encounter Mashu, who requests them to perform so they can fill a gap left by another band failing to arrive.

episodes.title: Pray
episodes.plot: After Argonavis' performance, Banri suddenly doesn't feel good and has to be taken to a hospital.
